mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.apply_no applyNo, t.apply_type applyType, t.cust_id custId, t.cust_no custNo , t.user_no userNo , t.form_id formId, t.business_no businessNo, t.busi_type busiType, t.acc_no accNo, t.contract_id contractId, t.trade_amount tradeAmount, t.real_trade_amount realTradeAmount, t.trade_charge_amount tradeChargeAmount, t.apply_state applyState, t.trade_state tradeState, t.bespoke_date bespokeDate, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.seq_no seqNo, t.mchn_child mchnChild, t.mchn_parent mchnParent, t.count count, t.success_count successCount, t.channel_no channelNo FROM t_gq_fss_trade_apply t

SELECT t.id id, t.cust_id custId, t.apply_no applyNo, t.apply_type applyType, t.business_no businessNo, t.busi_type busiType, t.contract_id contractId, t.seq_no seqNo, t.bespoke_date bespokeDate, t.acc_no accNo, t.trade_amount tradeAmount, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.mchn_child mchnChild, t.apply_state applyState, t.trade_state tradeState, t.count count, t.success_count successCount, t.real_trade_amount realTradeAmount, t.channel_no channelNo, c.`name` custName, c.mobile custMobile FROM t_gq_fss_trade_apply t left join t_gq_fss_customer c ON t.cust_id=c.cust_id
mapper.select: SELECT t.mchn_child mchn, t.seq_no seq_no, t.busi_type trade_type, t.contract_id busi_no, t.real_trade_amount real_trade_amount, case when t.trade_state=10080002 then '10080002' when t.trade_state=10080003 then '10080003' when t.trade_state=10080011 then '10080011' else '10080010' end resp_code FROM t_gq_fss_trade_apply t WHERE t.mchn_child=#{mchn} and t.seq_no=#{seqNo}
